value.title: StarCraft 2: EASY Zerg Build Order! (In Depth!)
value.excerpt: In this video I cover a relatively easy build order for new or returning Zerg players for StarCraft 2: Heart of the Swarm. value.title: StarCraft 2: How-to Baneling Bust INTELLIGENTLY! (Guide)
value.excerpt: Baneling Busting is one of the easiest Zerg all-ins in the game. Most Zerg players are aware of this strategy and realise that it works great on the lower part of the ladder in Zerg versus Terran, Zerg versus Protoss and Zerg versus Zerg.   In this video I discuss how to Baneling Bust intelligent instead

value.title: StarCraft 2: VOID RAY & LURKER NERFS - The OFFICIAL Balance Patch!
value.excerpt: New balance changes were just announced for StarCraft 2. These are my very first impressions of the patch. This patch includes changes to the Shield Battery, Dark Templar, Void Ray, Queen, Widow Mine, Lurker and Nydus Worm.
